CustomField.description: Customer Subscription value at point of sale. This field is not dynamic and is populated based on a workflow.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for billing. Populated when Opportunity Stage Name is Pending BW Signature through a process builder. Once the Opp stage is set to Complete the Opp then aggregates this instead of the dynamic.
CustomField.label: XXCurrent Customer Subscription (kW DC)
